biotools.summary: Genetic Interaction-Based Biomarkers Identification for Drug Resistance and Sensitivity in Cancer Cells | Cancer cells generally harbor hundreds of alterations in the cancer genomes and act as crucial factors in the development and progression of cancer | However, detection of genetic interactions in the cancer genome is a major obstacle in the research of identifying biomarkers for cancer cell drug resistance and sensitivity
